name: dynamic-choices
description: HTML Element Wrapper and Dynamically Filled Options Functionality for Choices.js

scripts.build: npx babel src/DynamicChoices.js --out-dir lib && npx uglifyjs lib/DynamicChoices.js -o dist/DynamicChoices.min.js --ie8 -c --source-map
scripts.build:esm: npx babel src/DynamicChoices.esm.js --out-dir lib && npx uglifyjs lib/DynamicChoices.esm.js -o dist/DynamicChoices.esm.min.js --ie8 -c --source-map

author: Anthony Woodard
